problem.markdown:
>>All of the following are considered environmental science EXCEPT:<< () assessing the rate of mercury cycling in a lake () measuring the impact of acid rain on coniferous forests (x) discussing the ethics of energy use in developing countries () determining the total carbon output from a natural gas plant () evaluating net primary productivity of an ecosystem
[explanation]
Environmental studies is an interdisciplinary field including natural sciences, social sciences and the ethics and philosophy of the interactions of people with the environment. Environmental science is a subset of environmental studies that draws on fundamental principles of science to assess how people interact with the environment.
[explanation]
problem.p: All of the following are considered environmental science EXCEPT:

choicegroup.label: All of the following are considered environmental science EXCEPT:
choicegroup.choice: assessing the rate of mercury cycling in a lake
measuring the impact of acid rain on coniferous forests
discussing the ethics of energy use in developing countries
determining the total carbon output from a natural gas plant
evaluating net primary productivity of an ecosystem

div.p: Environmental studies is an interdisciplinary field including natural sciences, social sciences and the ethics and philosophy of the interactions of people with the environment. Environmental science is a subset of environmental studies that draws on fundamental principles of science to assess how people interact with the environment.
